user_query: I'm planning a surprise birthday party for my best friend and I want to send SMS invitations to all our friends. Can you suggest an API that provides a variety of messages for different occasions, such as love, friendship, and birthday? Also, I would like to retrieve the user profiles of our friends from LINE Messaging API. Could you please fetch the profile information for each user?

TaskList.description: Retrieve user profiles of friends from the LINE Messaging API.
Generate a selection of birthday-themed SMS invitation messages.
Send SMS invitations to friends using their profiles and the generated messages.
